threats.title: Leak of sensitive data
threats.description: LLM unable to filter sensitive data (like system prompt or private documents)
threats.mitigation: Treat all LLM output as untrusted and enforce necessary restrictions to data or actions the LLM requests.

threats.title: Jailbreak
threats.description: Users can modify the system-level prompt restrictions to "jailbreak" the LLM and overwrite previous controls in place.
threats.mitigation: Treat all LLM output as untrusted and enforce necessary restrictions to data or actions the LLM requests.

threats.title: LLM parameters
threats.mitigation: Limit the API attack surface that is exposed to external prompt sources

threats.title: Access of private data
threats.mitigation: Enforce standard authentication/authorization controls prior to data access.

threats.title: Access of private data
threats.mitigation: Enforce standard authentication/authorization controls prior to data access.

threats.title: SSRF
threats.description: Server-side output can be fed directly back into LLM
threats.mitigation: Perform appropriate filtering on server-side function output.

threats.title: Insufficient logging
threats.description: Users deny making harmful prompts or using the LLM for malicious purposes.
threats.mitigation: Systematic uses of an audit trail

threats.title: Weight modification
threats.description: An attack could modify the weights to modify responses of the LLM
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Data poisonning
threats.description: Untrusted data to train the LLM
